title: Senior Business Analyst
description:

They perform their role with little oversight and takes a structured approach to analysis and problem solving. At this level the analyst relies on their experience and training to form innovative ideas and provides practical recommendations to complex situations. Key Responsibilities Work with all levels of the organization to capture project goals, objectives, and the associated requirements.
